i havent try this, but ive tried the mushroom rice grilled chicken spinach wrap in McDonald's China and i LOVE IT SO MUCH!!! it was their permeant menu, and i ALWAYS GO FOR IT whenever im in China! :3 but recently they have remove it from their permeant menu and im very sad. i guess it's because the China chinese don't really like it? cause i've never seen them ordering or eating it. but i REALLY hope Singapore will have it too! it's super nice!!! IM SURE IT WILL BE SUPER POPULAR & LOVED in Singapore. CONFIRM!!! :)

After seeing lots of McDonald's advertisement for the LOVE HOTCAKES last  few weeks, told my colleagues that we should try this morning.  We stopped by at Geylang East branch and ordered one set Egg Muffin Meal and one set of Hearty Hotcakes meal all with coffee and was asked to pay S$11.65 by the counter staff wearing a tie. Within ten minutes the meals were packed for takeaway and went to our office to enjoy this hearty breakfast. When we opened our meal of Hearty Hotcakes, we were very disappointed there was no hot fudge and strawberry syrup as per your picture in the papers and at the counter.
